Author: tlrobinson
Content:
Yeah, I don't think it would be too hard, you just need a microcontroller, digital compass, a bunch of vibrating motors, and a power source.

Vibrating motors: http://www.sparkfun.com/commerce/product_info.php?products_i...

Digital compasses: http://www.sparkfun.com/commerce/categories.php?cPath=23_83

Author: tel
Content: Kind of juvenile. Interesting if you've never heard of the concept before, silly otherwise.

Author: tel
Content:
It's pretty similar to the previous Casting Spels in Lisp tutorial in that it's overly cute and loquacious but does manage to approach a heady topic with some degree of innocence.

It's more targeted as an intro to Haskell for the light hobbyist, really.

Author: dominiek
Content:
No worries!

I had some issues with a sudden spike in load so I just added an extra machine. Hope that will get me going for a couple of days :-)
